## ğŸš€ Recommended Usage

### For Development (Daily)
Use **Backend Test** workflow:
- Fastest feedback
- Focused on backend changes
- Automatic PR comments
- Code coverage tracking

### For Feature Branches
Use **Test & Build** workflow:
- Tests backend + frontend
- Comprehensive validation
- Generates all artifacts

### Before Releases
Use **Integration Test** workflow:
- Full stack validation
- Production-like environment
- End-to-end testing
- Validates all service interactions

## ğŸ” Security Considerations

- âœ… No secrets required for basic workflows
- âœ… Database passwords are test-only (not production)
- âœ… Artifacts are stored securely by GitHub
- âœ… Retention policies automatically expire old artifacts
- âš ï¸ Remember to add secrets for production deployments
